channel.title: [PI] MOnster Drop rate. help!
channel.description: Okay so i read the other post it says in npcdrop.tsm, example : 11335:1 , and people said the 1 is the rate but no i've tested them all and its the ammount so please some1 helpme!

item.title: [PI] MOnster Drop rate. help!
item.dc:creator: @turmoil-pkz turmoil-pkz
item.description:
@turmoil-pkz wrote:

no the 1 would stand for the amount.
to edit drop rates you would change the lines like the first line would be common drops, secound line rarer and so on.

#Jungle strykewyrm
3592:40 995:150000 561:60 557:60 1462:1 1440:1 5300:5 5296:5 5698:1 1149:1 1434:1 2366:1 1249:1
4585:1 989:1 989:1 989:1

the first one 3592:40 is the npc id and the %100 drop is 40.

Read full topic
